tasks.label: git-commit-push
tasks.command: cd /workspaces/CVOPro && rm -f send_test.py send_test_notification.py research.py research.ipynb && echo '=== FILES DELETED ===' && git add -A && echo '=== GIT STATUS ===' && git status && echo '=== GIT COMMIT ===' && git commit -m 'fix: prevent data loss â€” remove destructive startup code, add DB backups and disk mount checks' -m '' -m '- Stop resetting RCM password on every startup (was generating new salt each boot, breaking sessions)' -m '- Stop blanking Luminary/Eric profile fields on every startup (was wiping user data)' -m '- Stop overwriting eric contact info on every startup' -m '- Add persistent disk mount check on production startup' -m '- Add automatic DB backup before every startup (keeps 5 most recent)' -m '- Add fresh-database detection to prevent silent data loss' -m '- Remove test/research files from repo' && echo '=== GIT PUSH ===' && git push origin main && echo '=== ALL DONE ==='

tasks.label: investigate
tasks.command: cd /workspaces/CVOPro && HUB_TOKEN=$(grep hub_session /tmp/cookies_admin.txt 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $NF}') && echo '=== claims client_id=2 ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/claims?client_id=2' && echo '' && echo '=== claims client_id=3 ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/claims?client_id=3' && echo '' && echo '=== claims client_id=6 ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/claims?client_id=6' && echo '' && echo '=== credentialing ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/credentialing' && echo '' && echo '=== edi ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/edi' && echo '' && echo '=== payments ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/payments' && echo '' && echo '=== production ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/production' && echo '' && echo '=== files ===' && curl -s -b "hub_session=$HUB_TOKEN" 'https://medpharma-hub.onrender.com/hub/api/files' && echo ALLDONE2
